full_summary:
**Government Contract: Shipboard Heading Systems RFSO**
================================================owanDescription Implemented!

**Government Tender Invitation**
-------------------------

The Canadian Coast Guard seeks a Standing Offer for the provision of type-approved heading systems/equipment. This Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) is inviting suppliers to submit their offers at any time.

**Key Details**
--------------

* **Contract Number:** WS3861342941-Doc3912604303
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3861342941
* **Publication Date:** March 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 27, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT (14:00)
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 28, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** May 4, 2026

**Procurement Information**
---------------------------

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada

**Contracting Entity**
----------------------

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO).

**Contact Information**
-------------------------

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact:

Kathy Large
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: kathy.large@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Attachments and Supporting Documents**
--------------------------------------------

Please refer to the tender notice posted on the [link to notice URL](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15680143?extsite=MTU2ODAxNDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for more information on the tender package.

---

Here is a description of the goods and services required:

The Canadian Coast Guard requires the provision of type-approved heading systems/equipment, which are to be delivered to provinces in Canada, as and when requested.
